body_html:
If someone out there wants to work on CMake support for TensorFlow, I think we would welcome it as a contribution to our repo (so bazel and CMake would be options.).

If anyone has the time to help us out, maybe send an email out to the discuss mailing list and all interested parties can collaborate.
body_text:
If someone out there wants to work on CMake support for TensorFlow, I think we would welcome it as a contribution to our repo (so bazel and CMake would be options.).
If anyone has the time to help us out, maybe send an email out to the discuss mailing list and all interested parties can collaborate.
body:
If someone out there wants to work on CMake support for TensorFlow, I think we would welcome it as a contribution to our repo (so bazel and CMake would be options.).

If anyone has the time to help us out, maybe send an email out to the discuss mailing list and all interested parties can collaborate.
